name: Online Circle Pong
description:
In an attempt to create the perfect ping-pong.
All movement in the game occurs in a circle. The goal is simple - do not skip the ball into your own goal and score the ball to the opponent.
A large number of settings and several game modes allow you to create that game - which you want and at the same time you can always find something new from other players.
All action is accompanied by 8 bit music and few maps with different atmospheres.
